select a.area_seq,a.areaname, (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=0) as 'assetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=0 and eq.nclientsetup=0) as 'assetrecevingcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=1) as 'notassetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=1 and eq.nclientsetup=0) as 'notassetrecevingcount' from tb_area a where active=0
and date(created)>=#{fixedDate}

select count(*) from (select a.area_seq,a.areaname,o.officename,d.department_seq,d.departmentname, (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=0 and eq.nclientsetup=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetrecevingcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=1 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'notassetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=1 and eq.nclientsetup=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'notassetrecevingcount' from tb_department d join tb_office o on d.office_seq=o.office_seq join tb_area a on o.area_seq=a.area_seq where a.area_seq=#{area_seq} and a.active=0) areadpcount

select a.area_seq,a.areaname,o.officename,d.department_seq,d.departmentname, (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=0 and eq.nclientsetup=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'assetrecevingcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=1 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'notassetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber where eq.assetYN=1 and eq.nclientsetup=0 and em.department_seq=d.department_seq) as 'notassetrecevingcount' from tb_department d join tb_office o on d.office_seq=o.office_seq join tb_area a on o.area_seq=a.area_seq where a.area_seq=#{area_seq} and a.active=0

select a.area_seq,a.areaname, (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=0) as 'assetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=0 and eq.nclientsetup=0) as 'assetrecevingcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=1) as 'notassetcount', (select count(*) from tb_equipment eq join tb_employee em on eq.employeenumber=em.employeenumber join tb_area a2 on em.area_seq=a2.area_seq where em.area_seq=a.area_seq and eq.assetYN=1 and eq.nclientsetup=0) as 'notassetrecevingcount' from tb_area a
